doc.name: measureText
doc.summary: Returns the width, size or bounds of the text drawn with the effective font attribute of the given object.

description.p: Use the measureText function to find the dimensions of text drawn with the effective font attributes of an object.
The text is any native string. For unicode strings use measureUnicodeText.
The object reference is an expression that evaluates to an object reference.

ul.li: width - (default if not specified) - returns the width of the text
size - returns the width,height of the text
bounds - returns a rectangle identifying the bounds of the text in the form 0,-ascent,width,descent where ascent and descent are relative to a 0 baseline the text is drawn on.
